Sentencas: In this study, the effects of porous GDC interlayer(s) addition into NiO-YSZ anode functional layer on the performance of anode supported solid oxide fuel cells are experimentally studied.
Titulo: Novel structured anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells with porous GDC interlayers

Sentencas: The number and porosity of GDC interlayer(s) are also considered in the study.
Titulo: Novel structured anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells with porous GDC interlayers

Sentencas: For this purpose, firstly three different NiO-YSZ anode supported cells having various NiO-YSZ anode functional thicknesses are fabricated by tape casting and screen printing methods as base cases.
Titulo: Novel structured anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells with porous GDC interlayers

Sentencas: Other cells are also fabricated similarly by adding 1-3 GDC interlayer(s) having different porosities into anode functional layer, keeping the total anode functional layer thickness as the same.
Titulo: Novel structured anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells with porous GDC interlayers

Sentencas: The porosity of the interlayer is controlled by changing the pore former content in the tape casting solution of GDC interlayer from 5 wt % to 20 wt%.
Titulo: Novel structured anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells with porous GDC interlayers

Sentencas: Thus, fifteen anode supported cells in total are fabricated and tested.
Titulo: Novel structured anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells with porous GDC interlayers

Sentencas: All cells have 16 cm(2) active area and are characterized by performance and impedance tests as well as microstructural analyses.
Titulo: Novel structured anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells with porous GDC interlayers

Sentencas: The results reveal that it is possible to improve the cell performance by GDC interlayer addition.
Titulo: Novel structured anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells with porous GDC interlayers

Sentencas: The base cell prepared with three NiO-YSZ anode functional layers provides only 0.283 Wcm(-2) peak power density at 800 degrees C, while the modified cell, where NiO-YSZ layer in the middle is substituted by a GDC interlayer prepared with 15 wt % pore former, exhibits 0.582 Wcm(-2) maximum power density at the same operating conditions.
Titulo: Novel structured anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells with porous GDC interlayers

Sentencas: Furthermore, the cell performance is found to decrease with increasing the number of GDC interlayer, while it is shown to increase with the pore former content up to 15 wt %.
Titulo: Novel structured anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells with porous GDC interlayers

Sentencas: The variations in the cell performance are due to changes in the ohmic, charge transfer and diffusion resistances as confirmed by impedance analyses as a result of resultant anode functional layer microstructure depending on the cell design observed by scanning electron microscope.
Titulo: Novel structured anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells with porous GDC interlayers
